body.description: Features • Uses Oxi-technology to purify your indoor air • Provides relief from: allergies and other respiratory problems • Takes up no floor or counter space • Portable and compact • Kills mold • Perfect size for travel • Restores the air in a musty basement, attic, bathroom, kitchen, car or RV • Neutralizes pet odors • Quiet operation • Oxygenates the air

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #92,501 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #15 in Home Travel-Size Air Purifiers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EdenPURE has announced a new advanced air purifier that purifies the air like Nature’s Thunderstorm. It destroys over 100 more air pollutants than big HEPA air purifiers. New studies have found that indoor air is 10 times worse than outdoor air. There are hundreds of pollutants in indoor air that can cause serious illness and even death, especially black mold which puts deadly spores into the air we breathe. Mold also contributes to allergies and asthma. The EdenPURE OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm destroys black mold air pollution which has been linked to Alzheimer’s, cancer and many other serious health problems that HEPAs do not destroy. Most homes have black mold air pollution which is mainly produced by air conditioner condensation. It also destroys over 100 harmful pollutants that other air purifiers do not. Old-style air purifiers such as HEPA filters and static air purifiers do not destroy over 100 dangerous pollutants. The EdenPURE OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm does destroy these dangerous pollutants through oxidation like a thunderstorm in the air and on surfaces. Old-style air purifiers require the air to be brought to the unit. But the worst air never comes to the unit. The compact EdenPURE OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm produces and sends out safe levels of ozone molecules, that attack all pollutants in every square inch of an area, including behind objects. These O3 molecules destroy up to 99.9% of air pollutants and turn them into harmless vapor and ash. No matter where the pollution is, it cannot hide from these super-oxygen cleaners, including surfaces. This super-oxygen cleaner, or safe ozone, is the way nature purifies the air. It is produced by the Sun and thunderstorms.

No filters to replace. Just plug it into an electrical outlet and forget it. The EdenPURE OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm produces activated oxygen, or ozone, which has a distinct smell and lets you know it's working. This smell may be irritating to some individuals with sensitive lungs. If you experience any issues, only turn on the OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm when you are NOT in the room and turn it off when you return. Before using the room again wait approximately 30 minutes for the activated oxygen smell to dissipate from the room. This will still give you the amazing benefits of clean, fresh air without any irritation.

Never breathe unhealthy, bad air again Sanitizes Bathrooms Bathrooms tend to get musty and moldy due to moist conditions. Run OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm to control mold and bacteria. Eliminates Odors Eliminate unwanted pet smells from litter boxes, urine, pet dander. Get rid of cooking smells, cigarette smell and more. Freshens Closets Set OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm inside your closet (extension cord may be required) to get rid of bacteria and odors. Goes Where You Do Traveling? Bring OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm with you to ensure a clean smelling hotel room, free of smoke and other odors.

Sanitizes Mattresses Sleeping on a mattress every night for 8 hours can cause it to contain a host of bacteria and odors. OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm can remove both! Prevents Mold Growth Gets rid of mold smell and prevents future mold growth no matter where it is hiding. Stabilizes VOC’s Reduces chemical by-products like VOCs and glues that go hand-in-hand with remodeling work. Protects Your Home Place an OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm directly in front of your return air intake for quick and easy whole home ventilation.

The OxiLeaf Thunderstorm is completely portable for use in your vehicles and small out-of-the-way places. You can also use a USB cord to plug into the USB port on the OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm so you can put your OxiLeaf II Thunderstorm directly into tight places like in your car, cupboards or in some stinky shoes.

Specifications Dimensions: 5.125” H x 4.3” L x 2” D 50 - 60 Hz Recommended room size: Medium Weight: 9.7 oz. No filters or fillers needed Output - adjustable Includes an 8' USB Cord Features • Uses Oxi-technology to purify your indoor air • Provides relief from: allergies and other respiratory problems • Takes up no floor or counter space • Portable and compact • Kills mold • Perfect size for travel • Restores the air in a musty basement, attic, bathroom, kitchen, car or RV • Neutralizes pet odors • Quiet operation • Oxygenates the air

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my (new to me) camper hoping to get rid of a musty odor that lingered after I completelydisinfected and cleaned. I tried another one prior to this but did nothing. To my surprise this hasexceeded my expectations. Odor is completely gone - clean scent now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Works as described. Portability and ease of use big plus. Instruction guide important and points out moisture and humidity could cause damage. Shuts off every half hour for two minutes to cool off then restarts. Comes with a 30 day satisfaction guarantee and 1 year warranty from the manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working after 5 weeks. Tried reaching customer service by email and phone several times with no reply. Save your money and buy a candle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a thunderstorm 😎
reviews.reviewText: I love this. It takes away the horrible smells like garbage from the kitchen or from the litter box after a cat goes to the bathroom. I haven’t tried the bathroom yet but it does take care of the bathroom smells outside of the bathroom.😎

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does what it should. Fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Perfect when it works.
reviews.reviewText: So I've been fortunate in that most of the ones I'm using have been working. One didn't. I feel like the price is too high for it to feel as flimsy as they do. But out of 4 of them in two different homes, only one seemed to crap out after a week, and a second one seems a bit weak in performance. But this uncertainty should only be concerned at $20, not any product over $100.But one home has a serious mold problem and I walked in recently not coughing like a chainsmoker after using these devices, so I'm not sure if I can recommend or not. Some are saying they notice the smell but no cleaning result... Well, my experience is that the smell will fill the air first. When I come back hours later, sometimes the smell is there or not, but normally the air feels completely cleaned out and is easier to breathe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024

reviews.reviewText: It does take the smells out of the air. It does emit an ozone smell when turned on but its not unpleasent to me. It is pretty quiet but I too loud at bedtime for my liking. No problem though as it isn't neccesary to have on all the time. Super easy to opperate and its a very small little unit but it works well even in decent sized rooms.
